thread.title: Live: London reels after Westminster terrorist attack - ABC News (Australian Broadcasting Corporation)
thread.title_full: Live: London reels after Westminster terrorist attack - ABC News (Australian Broadcasting Corporation)

title: Live: London reels after Westminster terrorist attack - ABC News (Australian Broadcasting Corporation)
text:
Live: London reels after Westminster terrorist attack Updated March 23, 2017 07:07:12 
A counter-terrorism investigation is underway in London after an attacker used a car to run down pedestrians on Westminster Bridge before stabbing a policeman to death in the grounds of the Houses of Parliament. 
At least four people, including the attacker, died, while 20 were injured. 
Follow live.
